channel.sql:sqlx: select XMLAGG (XMLELEMENT ('item', XMLELEMENT('title', Name), XMLELEMENT('guid', 'http://'||HTTP_GET_HOST ()||http_path ()||'#'||Code), XMLELEMENT('link', sprintf ('http://%s/tutorial/web/vx_s_13/c_disp.vspx?c=%U', HTTP_GET_HOST (), Name)), XMLELEMENT('pubDate', date_rfc1123 (now ())), XMLELEMENT('description', vx_s_13_make_desc (Name, Code, SmallFlagDAVResourceURI)), XMLELEMENT('enclosure', XMLATTRIBUTES ( 'image/gif' as 'type', length (LargeFlag) as 'length', 'http://'||HTTP_GET_HOST ()||LargeFlagDAVResourceURI as 'url')) )) from Demo.demo.Countries, Demo.demo.Flags where CountryCode = Code and lower(Name) like :mask
